Brightwing.name: Arcane Flare
Brightwing.description: Deal 274 (+4% per level) damage in a small area and 91 (+4% per level) damage in a larger area.

Brightwing.name: Polymorph
Brightwing.description: Target is slowed by 25% Movement Speed, and cannot attack and is Silenced making them unable to use Abilities for 1.25 seconds.

Brightwing.name: Pixie Dust
Brightwing.description: Increase target's Movement Speed by 20%, and grant them 30 Spell Armor for 3 seconds, reducing Spell damage taken by 30%.

Brightwing.name: Blink Heal
Brightwing.description: Teleport to a nearby ally, healing them for 204 (+4% per level). Stores up to 2 charges.

Brightwing.name: Emerald Wind
Brightwing.description: After 0.5 seconds, create an expanding nova of wind, dealing 319 (+4% per level) damage and pushing enemies away.  Passive: Increases the healing of Soothing Mist by 8%.

Brightwing.name: Soothing Mist
Brightwing.description: Brightwing heals nearby allied Heroes for 115 (+4% per level) every 4 seconds.

Brightwing.name: Phase Shift
Brightwing.description: Instead of mounting, teleport to an allied Hero.

1.name: Dream Shot
1.description: Reduces the cooldown of Arcane Flare by 1 second for each enemy Hero hit by the outer radius, and 3 seconds for each hit by the inner radius.

1.name: Hyper Shift
1.description: Each allied Hero healed by Soothing Mist reduces the cooldown of Phase Shift by 2 seconds.

1.name: Pixie Charm
1.description: Each time Brightwing heals an Allied Hero with Soothing Mist, she gains a stack of Bribe. Use 20 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum of 80 stacks.

4.name: Arcane Barrage
4.description: Increases the range of Arcane Flare by 50%.

4.name: Manic Pixie
4.description: When Soothing Mist heals an ally with Pixie Dust on them, they heal for an additional 104 (+4% per level) over 4 seconds.

4.name: Peekaboo!
4.description: Phase Shifting to an ally reveals a large area around them and all enemies in it for 6 seconds.

4.name: Unstable Anomaly
4.description: When Polymorph ends, deal 114 (+4% per level) damage to the target and all nearby enemies.

7.name: Cleanse
7.description: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on yourself.

7.name: Mistified
7.description: Reduces the cooldown of Soothing Mist by 0.5 seconds every time Brightwing casts a Basic Ability.

7.name: Phase Shield
7.description: After finishing the teleport, the target of Brightwing's Phase Shift gains a 400 (+4% per level) point Shield for 10 seconds.

10.name: Blink Heal
10.description: Teleport to a nearby ally, healing them for 204 (+4% per level). Stores up to 2 charges.

10.name: Emerald Wind
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, create an expanding nova of wind, dealing 319 (+4% per level) damage and pushing enemies away.  Passive: Increases the healing of Soothing Mist by 8%.

13.name: Ice Block
13.description: Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds.

13.name: Pixie Boost
13.description: Pixie Dust gives 50% bonus Move Speed, decaying to 20% over 1.5 seconds.

13.name: Shield Dust
13.description: Pixie Dust grants 50 Physical Armor for 3 seconds, reducing Physical damage taken by 50%.

13.name: Sticky Flare
13.description: Enemies hit by Arcane Flare have their Movement Speed slowed by 40% for 2 seconds.

16.name: Bouncy Dust
16.description: Pixie Dust bounces to another nearby ally upon impact.

16.name: Critterize
16.description: While Polymorphed, the target's Armor is reduced by 25, increasing the damage they take by 25%.

16.name: Greater Polymorph
16.description: Increases the duration of Polymorph by 0.75 seconds.

16.name: Hardened Focus
16.description: While above 80% life, your Basic Ability cooldowns regenerate 50% faster.

20.name: Continuous Winds
20.description: Emerald Wind releases two additional novas that deal 25% damage. Also further increases the healing bonus of Soothing Mist by 7%.

20.name: Double Wyrmhole
20.description: Blink Heal can be cast a second time on a different target within 2 seconds without consuming a charge.

20.name: Revitalizing Mist
20.description: Healing another Hero with Soothing Mist increases their healing received from Soothing Mist by 25% for 6 seconds. Stacks 3 times.

20.name: Storm Shield
20.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.
